deduction_content: The sole of sweeping foot leaves the ground after making contact for the sweeping action

questions.question: What is the error code for Hou Sao Tui (Back Sweep)?
What are the two main deduction points for Hou Sao Tui?
questions.answer: Deductions are applied when: 1) The sole of sweeping foot leaves the ground after making contact, and 2) Sweeping leg is bent 45° or more.

questions.question: What is the correct foot position during a Hou Sao Tui sweep?
questions.answer: The sole of the sweeping foot should maintain contact with the ground throughout the sweeping action.
